A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm such a big Star Wars fan and wanted to love this movie. The scenes with Rey and Luke are absolutely great\, but the \"side quest\" of Finn\, Poe\, and Rose absolutely killed the movie. Acting was great\, but man was this some bad writing. There is A LOT of pointless scenes (no spoilers). It was fun only because it was Star Wars and you love the characters. I'm so disappointed.\n\nIt's never been more obvious that the critics are somehow being manipulated into high reviews.
